text:
GOALS AFTER 100 #BPL MATCHES:
Shearer 79, 
Van Nistelrooy 68, 
Aguero 64, 
A Cole 63, 
Torres 63 http://t.co/xvP3TET6b6
BUY/BYE Time to bring in @RomeluLukaku9 & offload @NChadli? Here's @EASPORTSFIFA with this week's #FPL tips... http://t.co/VLFobpEZxo
Check out all the Matchweek 14 stats - including @OfficialFOXES' fine home record v @LFC: http://t.co/k9NvSYOArM http://t.co/U0595rII6Z
The last 7 @whufc_official goals in the #BPL have been scored by 7 different players #WBAWHU http://t.co/Qo1KPqyrv6
Free-scoring @NUFC lead the #BU21PL Division 2 standings. Monday's round-up: http://t.co/LHkffFqELw #BU21PL http://t.co/cLSId1z8J8
TEAM NEWS 3 changes to the @whufc_official team to face @WBAFCofficial as Reid, Nolan & Zarate come in for Collins, Noble & Jarvis #WBAWHU
GOAL Leicester 1-1 Liverpool (26 mins) Adam Lallana drives in the equaliser after Gerrard's free-kick was cleared #LEILIV
GOAL West Brom 1-2 West Ham (45+3 mins). James Tomkins rises highest to meet a corner and give his team the lead #WBAWHU
PHOTO Mata's inswinging free-kick put Man Utd back in front. They still lead Stoke with 20 mins to play #MUNSTK http://t.co/JDwijwPMZY

Back-to-back wins for @LFC, will they make the top four?
VOTE now at http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V http://t.co/pLZHfQvL17
Steven Gerrard's goal against Leicester means he has now scored against 33 #BPL teams http://t.co/4VusZqGCP5
Leicester 1-3 Liverpool: @LFC's Steven Gerrard has now scored against 33 #BPL sides #LEILIV http://t.co/MOsQ099wv4
Remember the League's fastest-ever treble? Hat-trick heroes feature on Day 3 of our #BPL Advent Calendar...  http://t.co/CLl9tBfWPp
TEAM NEWS Erik Lamela replaces Roberto Soldado for @SpursOfficial; Didier Drogba in for the suspended Diego Costa for @chelseafc #CHETOT
GOAL Sunderland 1-0 Man City (19 mins) Zabaleta slides in on Wickham after Larsson's pass and the ball deflects past Hart #SUNMCI
SUB Kurt Zouma is on for the second half for Chelsea, replacing Gary Cahill. Chelsea 2-0 Spurs (46 mins) #CHETOT
FULL-TIME Chelsea 3-0 Spurs. The leaders remain unbeaten thanks to goals from Hazard, Drogba & Remy #CHETOT http://t.co/jrNJKZSOyg
"It's very important to be an attractive, offensive team for the fans" - Pellegrini on Sunderland 1-4 @MCFC #SUNMCI http://t.co/YdkyWQrt4o
“I’m so happy. The points, the goal difference, the performance" - Jose Mourinho on Chelsea 3-0 Spurs http://t.co/Ch0hZTVbMV

BEST MINS/GOAL IN #BPL HISTORY (MIN 10 GOALS) 
Costa - 83.3 (11 goals) 
Aguero - 108 (66 goals) 
Henry - 121.8 (175 goals)
Ready for #BPL Matchweek 15? Find out where you can see the latest action: http://t.co/YuRA48XV0N http://t.co/HMBEaeD2y0
Only @Arsenal (twice), @MCFC and @ManUtd have gone unbeaten over the first 15 matches of a #BPL season. Will @chelseafc join them? #NEWCHE
APPOINTMENTS Remind yourself which referees are taking charge in the #BPL this weekend: http://t.co/J4A8nS10by
"We certainly won't fear Arsenal." - @stokecity boss Mark Hughes is ready for Sat. Preview: http://t.co/Fs2uiaVAUl http://t.co/pvB22QfAfu
TEAM NEWS @NUFC make 5 changes for the visit of @chelseafc with Coloccini, S Taylor, Sissoko, Colback and Cabella all coming in #NEWCHE
Jak Alnwick comes on to make his #BPL debut, replacing Rob Elliot in goal for the second half. It's Newcastle 0-0 Chelsea #NEWCHE
INJURY TIME Six more minutes will be played at St James' Park. Can @NUFC hold on? They lead Chelsea 2-1 #NEWCHE
KICK-OFF After a breathless start to Saturday's #BPL action, all five 1500 GMT matches are now under way http://t.co/LcWaMV0zW7

#BPL HALF-TIME SCORES: 
Hull 0-0 West Brom 
Liverpool 0-0 Sunderland 
QPR 0-0 Burnley 
Stoke 3-0 Arsenal 
Spurs 0-0 Palace
RED CARD Calum Chambers gets a second booking on 78 minutes and Arsenal are down to 10 men. Stoke 3-2 Arsenal #STKARS
The scene is set at the Etihad. @MCFC v @Everton kicks off in 15 minutes #MCIEVE #BPL http://t.co/deBMbwXheg
HALF-TIME Man City 1-0 Everton. @YayaToure strikes from the spot to give the home side the advantage #MCIEVE http://t.co/h9iiEmpHsy

So, who will win the #BPL? Chelsea, Man City - or someone else?

VOTE NOW at http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN
QPR 2-0 Burnley: An assist, a goal and a red card for @chazaustin9. Full report: http://t.co/RwXSu5D5FR http://t.co/eF4ZTDucPo
WATCH "We deserved [a point] - congratulations to Newcastle.” Jose Mourinho on @chelseafc's 2-1 defeat: http://t.co/qtCAlSnzVP
TABLE Here's a look at what Saturday's results did to the #BPL table... http://t.co/DqFz5CWzdY
PHOTO Final preparations from the players at the Boleyn Ground. West Ham v Swansea kicks off shortly... #WHUSWA http://t.co/VyX1KiRXLk
PHOTO @AndyTCarroll equalises and celebrates a first #BPL goal since 31 March. West Ham 1-1 Swansea (54 mins) #WHUSWA http://t.co/0YOjjkNIfY
FULL-TIME West Ham 3-1 Swansea. @AndyTCarroll strikes twice as @whufc_official rise to 3rd in the #BPL table #WHUSWA http://t.co/cbrKKRcyR3
SUB The injured Ashley Westwood has to make way just before half-time. Kieran Richardson comes on. Villa 1-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
FULL-TIME Villa 2-1 Leicester. Alan Hutton's first #BPL goal for 4 years earns @AVFCOfficial all 3 points #AVLLEI http://t.co/LeZo3ZpT9y
